skins.shipDescription: Fletcher-class destroyer - Thatcher, Hull Number DD-514!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Thatcher from the Little Beavers. I'm named after Rear Admiral Henry K. Thatcher. Awesome, right? Aren't you surprised?
skins.acquisition: Hi there, Commander! I'm Thatcher. Want to play a game with me?
skins.login: What tricks should we play on the other girls today, Commander? Heehee~!
skins.details: Don't touch my radar! It's our most effective weapon against the enemy during the night!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, don't just stand there, come play with me!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hahaha, look! Spence's reactions are so hilarious!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Since I don't know when I'll do something wrong, I'll just go ahead and apologize now.
skins.secretaryTouch: I know what it is you really want to touch, weirdo!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hoho? You wanna touch me there again?
